name: JJ Hiew
title: Partner, Developer
description: Formerly the CTO of [Merscient Inc](http://www.merscient.com), JJ has 10+ years of professional experience as a software developer & architect. He graduated from U of T with a B.Sc in Computer Science. JJ's dream is to combine his love of technology and delicious baked goods into a gajillion dollar business.

name: Ben Zelikovitz
title: Co-founder, Advisor
description:
Ben is a Director at [Sitescout](http://www.sitescout.com/) and has 10+ years of experience in Enterprise SaaS sales and operations.  Prioer to that, Ben was a Recruiting Manager for Randstad Canada's technology division.

His hero is Drake.

name: Disco Stu
title: Chief Scientist
description: Disco is the most diligent scientist we know, always testing the laws of gravity.
